msbt.message: Hey, ! We're going to go someplace special! <10_4 />Don't ask questions, just come!
I've been waiting for you to come out, ! Now, follow me!
There you are, !'K, bestieyou're going to come take a walk with me! Stay close. I don't want to lose track of you.
HAPPY BIRTHDAAAY!!!
I've been secretly planning you a birthday party, .Sooooooooo secretly.Now. Stand in front of the cake. Make a wish. And blow out the candles by pressing !
Everybody wanted to celebrate your b-day, But since this isn't a leap year, we're doing things a little earlier than usual!So go stand in front of the cake. Then blow out the candles by pressing !

We heard it was your birthday today, so we all got together and planned a party!And it's a leap year! It only comes once every four years, so it's totes special! Well, let's do this thing! Stand in front of the cake, then blow out the candles by pressing !
Ah! ! Where are you going?! Blow out the candles on your cake!
, wait! At least blow out the candles on the cake, 'K?
? What's wrong? It's your special dayyou have to blow out the candles!Come on. <10_4 />Do it.<10_4 /> Blow out the candles.You HAVE to blow out the candles.
Happy birthday!
Here's a birthday present from all of us, !
We all spent a couple of nights thinking about what you'd like!I think you'll really like your prezzie this year!
You won't know what's inside until you open it!Oh! Almost forgot! I have one more prezzie for you today, !I have to go get it ready, so wait here just a sec!

Hang on. ! Your pockets are full and you can't hold anything else!Well, then I'll just have to send you your birthday prezzie later!Oh! Full pockets or not, I got you another surprise! Wait right here. I'll be right back!
! Direct your attention tothe ceiling!KABAMBOOOOM! Check it out! That's your surprise prezzie!

Check it out, ! That thing hanging from the ceiling? That is a piñata, and they are fab!We all got together and made it just for you, !There are other prezzies inside the piñata, so hit it with all you've got!
We'll get going soon as you're ready. Just let me know when you want to start swinging that stick!
You ready? FABULOUS! It's time to start the piñata paartaaay!'K, I need you on standby under the piñata!

Now, the piñata won't bweak with some soft widdle thwicky-thwacks<10_4 /> You've got to SMACK that thing! , when I say "GO!" start mashing  like your b-day depends on it! Smackity-SMACK!Ready? I know you are Setthis is totes excitingGO!
Wooo! You cracked that thing open like a coconut on the sidewalk! You get birthday cupcakes!
You're really good at this piñata thing, !And the prezzie inside was birthday cupcakes, !
Awesome! You're a piñata pro! You've got the right grip and a hunger for prezzies!Speaking ofthe prezzie inside was birthday cupcakes!
These birthday cupcakes are our birthday prezzie to you!
There's a bunch! But you SO can't eat them all by yourself. You'd never have room for them all!You should totes consider giving some to your friends! That'd be très generous!
You can't take this right now? Boo!You know what? No worries! I'll just send the birthday cupcake right on over to your place!
Your pockets are packed full? You can't haul everything home? No worries!I'm down with sending everything over to your place, !
Andthat's it! What did you think? Pretty trendy party, right?I hope the rest of your birthday is all sparkles and laser beams!
Headed home, ? Today was SO FUN! I already can't wait until next year!
Hey! Aren't you going to smack the piñata around? Come on! You have to! We made it for you, !
Hey! Hold up! You haven't busted the piñata yet! Don't head out! Smack it open, !
You're going home? Butdon't you want to smash the piñata open? We made it for you, !

Stand in front of the cake, think really hard about your wish, then press  and let that wish fly!But you better hurry, or I'll do it!<10_4 /> I'm kidding! Wishes are, like, sacred things. I couldn't butt in on that!
Hurry up! Everyone is suuuuuuuper excited and waiting for you to blow out the candles!
It's totes nerve-racking to have everyone watch you blow out the candlesBut there isn't anything to fear! It's so easy you can't even mess up. Just press  to blow them out!
No matter how old you get, birthdays are super exciting!
Making piñatas is SO fun! We all put a lot of work into it! You should've seen the surprise on your face!
Cake is, you know, always top-notch! But the cakes you eat on your b-day, they taste special, don't they?
This b-day par-tay is for you, ! So let's party like it's your birthday!
Seems like you totally enjoyed your surprise birthday party! That makes me SO happy!
